entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 12.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending before morning then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
